Topic.Title: Will NVDA trade in the $20s anytime in the next year?!

Message.Msg: I agree that NVDA is undervalued. I own it and hope to break even at this time.But I will never put another dime in the stock market. The reason is simple: this is a trader's market. The retail investor is absent. Traders don't care about fundamentals, the primary criterion for sound stock picks. Unfortunately, it is irrelevant. Good luck.

Topic.Title: UBS ANALYST LOWERS Q4 EST. STOCK TANKS

Message.Msg: Did you understand the article.?UBS lowered by 4 tenths of 1 percent. That's from 16.56 to 16.50 BFD

Topic.Title: UBS ANALYST LOWERS Q4 EST. STOCK TANKS

Message.Msg: Your name suits you based on the other comments you have posted elsewhere . . and I don't think a couple of pennies on a VERY minor adjustment in estimates is 'tanking'. Bye bye.

Topic.Title: Analysts say that ARM based Macs likely, but would take a few years

Message.Msg: Yes, but needs ARM64 for more muscle... A15 doesn't have enough juice...

Message.Title: microsoft 7 inch Xbox tablet
Message.Msg: The news is all over the web today, Microsoft is building a 7 inch Xbox tablet, who is supplying the processor?
I'm sure they would like to take advantage of VGX.

Topic.Title: IHS/iSuppli tear down of Microsoft Surface RT

Message.Msg: msft 50% margins on their tablets - Ballmer says he wants his right now! El goog says, "that sounds just dandy to me, wish you lotsa luck!" BTW, next Android will have user profiles... goog is aiming squarely for the desktop + mobile. aapl will be just a road-kill towards that goal. winRT history today, msft history in a few short years.

Topic.Title: Gartner report: Win 8 tablets will lag IOS and Android. MS Surface will lose out on consumers but succeed in enterprise

Message.Msg: This is the typical safe projection to make about a new player though . . I think the jury will be out for a while on this . .

"Anybody else having trouble posting ?? Every reply I type won't post...", writes getanid404 Do try making your posts more relevant, more thought provoking, more meaningful, and most importantly -- more Honest. Yahoo is in the process of testing their new message board filters, don't u know. And Best has provided Yahoo with a plentitude of feedback on how to make this board, well, the very best. Yes, a Plentitude of Feedback, boys. Perhaps you are seeing the early results of that feedback? "Every reply I type won't post...."

Sort of like a MozRank or a PageRank, Yahoo is adopting a message relevancy filter. Looking for a few key words, don't u know. Which unfortunately, well, Best can't divulge. Oh no no no, boys. So maybe we'll see your hapless postings around. Or maybe not. Again. "Anybody else having trouble posting ?? Every reply I type won't post... "
some of amdsh*tfools and bestisis may work at yahoo.
